name: The Tale of Tuck
description:
Essentially a typing game, but instead of using the keyboard (like you normally would), you use a controller.

Don't even think about using a keyboard, because you can't (nor a mouse, but who's gonna make a typing game using only the mouse?).

As of now, there's only 3 levels.

Multiplayer is planned, however, it depends on whether I am able to finish this within a reasonable time frame (Unity makes it easy tho, so we should be good)

Ngl, this is only a demo
